quoted_tweet.text:
I thought Tesla was trying to kill me tonight.

AI was driving me in the fast lane at 79 m.p.h and all of a sudden it lunged across the yellow line.

Before I could take over a motorcyclist went by at a high rate of speed. In my lane. Or too close for me.

The Tesla saw him coming behind me and moved over to let him by. It quickly moved back after the motorcyclist was safely past.

AI was saving both of us.

Thank the lord Tesla‚Äôs AI is properly aligned with human outcomes.

No mere ‚Äúdriver assistance‚Äù package can do that.

And people try to claim others are the same. No they aren‚Äôt.
